channel.title: Xul.fr: Tutorials and Applications of the Web 2.0
channel.description: Ajax, JavaScript, XUL, RSS, PHP and all technologies of the Web 2.0. Building a CMS, tutorial and application.

item.title: Ajax Tutorial
item.description: Ajax and XMLHttpRequest with the GET, POST method for text, XML or JSON files.
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Building a CMS
item.description: Both a tutorial and an application. Writing the components of a content management system.
item.author: Sandrine Takis and Denis Sureau

item.title: RSS Tutorial
item.description: How to build an RSS feed, in the 2.0 format. Tools for RSS.
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Ajax Extensible Page
item.description: A small library to build pages the reader can summarize or develop at mouse clicks. Each part of the article will be extensible. No programming knowledge is required to use the tool.
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Displaying an RSS Feed
item.description: With just one PHP function you can display an RSS 2.0 or RSS RDF feed on any page of you website, from any source.
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Adding Pages Online
item.description: How to use the FCKEditor to add pages online to your website. This is a part of our CMS tutorial.
item.author: Sandrine Takis and Denis Sureau

item.title: JavaScript Case Studies
item.description: Summary of the syntax and case studies: sending parameters, two-states buttons, scoring articles...
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Ajax Demos
item.description: Demos of Ajax and XMLHttpRequest: checking for the existence of a file, states of the object, filling a form...
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Web Application
item.description: The technologies to build a Web application.
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Blog and Blogosphere
item.description: An article to know all that you must know about blogs and the blogosphere phenomenon. How people can make (a lot of) money thanks to a blog. How to build a blog. The addresses and the tools.
item.author: Denis Sureau

item.title: Webmaster of the Web 2.0
item.description: How to reach the top at not expense with a website? Read carefully the articlen the solution is here.
item.author: Denis Sureau
